titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the The relationship between Mens Rea and affirmative defense in the Cooley court's handling of homicide cases

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: The relationship between Mens Rea and affirmative defense in the Cooley court's handling of homicide cases

archdesc.bioghist: Law student at the University of Michigan.
archdesc.scopecontent: Student paper analyzing homicide cases before the Michigan Supreme Court, 1868-1878, when Thomas Cooley was a justice.
